- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Chris, Just called you back  give me a ring at your convenience. If I miss you I will call you back asap. If all else fails, you can schedule a time here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. Thanks, Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Rimorin, Chris [mailto:Chris.Rimorin@mcgladrey.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 27, 2013 11:46 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Christopher Rimorin Sara, Per my voicemail, please give me a call. Thanks,Chris Christopher G. Rimorin CFS Director <http://www.mcgladrey.com/>Experience the Power of Being Understood.? McGladrey LLP9737 Washingtonian BoulevardSuite 400Gaithersburg, MD 20878Office: 301-296-3616Cell: 301-385-3496Fax: 301-296-3501 Join my professional network on Linked In: http://www.linkedin.com/in/ChrisRimorin <http://www.linkedin.com/in/chrisrimorin> www.McGladreyClassic.com <http://www.McGladreyClassic.com> (November 4-10, 2013) <http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#!/McGladreyNews> <http://www.twitter.com/McGladrey> <http://www.youtube.com/user/McGladreyNews> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/3743?trk=tyah> From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Tuesday, February 26, 2013 7:08 PM To: Rimorin, Chris Subject: MBO Partners / Christopher Rimorin Dear Christopher, We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you. We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email. Regards, Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028f: 703-793-6070e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01OTEmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTU5MSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjA1MjYmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxNjUzMTAmZW1haWxpZD1jaHJpcy5yaW1vcmluQG1jZ2xhZHJleS5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTIwMDI2LTExMjgzMjMtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons67JZKXonjHpfsX56u4lWqW1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsFrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> DISCLAIMER: This e-mail is only intended for the person(s) to whom it is addressed and may contain confidential information.
